members.joinCircumstances: Masira is the founder and captain of the crew, leading their salvage operations.

keyMoments.title: Masira Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The Masira Pirates arrive at the St. Briss wreck site with their salvage ship. Masira introduces himself as the Salvage King and claims ownership of all wrecks in the area, establishing the crew's salvage operation business.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Masira Pirates, who later become allies of the Straw Hats as part of the Saruyama Alliance. Their salvage expertise proves crucial to understanding Sky Islands.

ships.description: A specialized salvage vessel equipped for underwater recovery operations.

bases.description: The Masira Pirates operate in the waters around Jaya Island, salvaging shipwrecks.

jollyRoger.description: Unknown - not shown in this episode
